# [Interview #897: Twitter 2013 (Non-WoT), Entry #15](https://www.theoryland.com/intvmain.php?i=897#15)

#### [Vanessa (23 January 2013)](https://twitter.com/wilde4fitness/status/294187875321401344)

Does the chasm on Sel have a counterpart in the cognitive realm?

#### [Brandon Sanderson (23 January 2013)](http://twitter.com/BrandSanderson/status/294188557248131072)

Yes, it does. But moving around there is really tough . . .
